emcc modules.c -o interface.html -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_addFlight','_loadFlightsFromFile','_getAllFlightsJSON','_getAllPassengersJSON','_register_user','_login','_getOneWayFlightsJSON','_updateFlight','_deleteFlight','_addPassenger','_createPassengerRecords','_loadPassengers','_loadUserRecord','_deleteBookRecord','_deletePassenger','_CancellationNotif','_loadNotificationsJSON','_deleteNotificationsForUser','_getPassengerRecJSON','_createInitialAdmins','_malloc','_free','_unlink'] -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall','cwrap','setValue','UTF8ToString'] -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1  -lidbfs.js
